data.Title: Google Confirms AI Overviews Affected By Core Updates
data.Description: Google's John Mueller confirms core updates impact the search engine's AI-powered overviews.

data.Title: Baidu Blocks Google, Bing From Scraping Content
data.Description: Wikipedia-style service Baidu Baike recently barred the search engine crawlers of Google and Bing from indexing its online content.

data.Title: Perplexity Plans to Launch Ads in Q4
data.Description: In a pitch deck, AI search engine Perplexity told advertisers it plans to start running ads in Q4; a source says Perplexity's CPM prices will be $50+ "Advertisers will be able to sponsor “related…

data.Title: Google August 2024 Core Update
data.Description: Google released its August 2024 core update on Thursday, August 15th, followed shortly after by a large search ranking bug hours later.

data.Title: Bing Image Search Refinement Cards
data.Description: Microsoft now has these refinement cards or boxes directly in the Bing Image Search results interface. In these cards, Bing will show you a refinement option for your query with example photos you might find for that refined search query.

data.Title: Noindex/Nofollow Tags Don't Signify Low-Quality Pages
data.Description: Google's @g33konaut said that having lots of nofollow and/or noindex tags doesn't signify to Google that you have a lot of low-quality pages

data.Title: Bing Image Creator Adds Resize Feature
data.Description: Good News! Now You Can Easily Transform Your AI Images from Square to Landscape on Microsoft Bing Image Creator

data.Title: Reddit's Advertising Strategy
data.Description: Reddit is winning over advertisers with interest-based targeting via subreddits, instead of personal data; Analysis: Reddit's ad revenue to reach $1.1B+ in 2024

data.Title: Google Search Console Data Persists After Domain Expiration
data.Description: Google cautions: Search Console data remains after domain expiration. No reset option available. Temporary removal can hide expired sites.

data.Title: Google Disputes Specific SEO Audit Advice
data.Description: Google questions the validity of specific SEO audit suggestions made by automated tools

data.Title: Google Quietly Launches New AI Crawler
data.Description: Google rolled out a new bot for commercial AI customers and documentation for site owners to track its visits

data.Title: Google Offers Solutions for Inaccurate Product Pricing In Search
data.Description: Google's John Mueller offers solutions for retailers when inaccuarate prices are displayed in search results.

data.Title: Spammers Exploit Google With Reddit
data.Description: Frustrated by a flood of spam, an SEO exposed six ways cheaters are exploiting Google's search results with Reddit
